abilities.name: Type Shift
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Claydol ex's type is Fighting until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Psychic Boom
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shadow Crush
attacks.text: You may discard a Psychic Energy card attached to Claydol ex. If you do, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.
